name: Basic math quiz
description: This is a very simple math quiz, that will take you just 2 minutes.

questions.text: How many angles does a triangle have?

answers.text: There are no angles in a triangle
how long is a line defined by function
how big is the area under the function
maximum and minimum values of function

questions.text: Do you need to know linear algebra and calculus in order to get a programming job?

answers.text: Don't even touch the computer before learning DE
